page.title: 02Somers Town
page.content: Somers Town is in the North West part of London and the flats are quite big and most of the flats have a good view of the street below them. What I like best is the neighbours are very very friendly. There is always a friendly shopping place near you. Somers Town sed to have a lot of fields and farms before the railways. This is what it is like on my way to school noisy, scary and dusty and a bit of a long way from the school and it is smokey because of the cars and windy sometimes and i see pubs. There are nice buildings in Somers Town. Somers Town in 1985 is modernised because there are lots of cars, houses, offices and loads and loads of buisy buisness men and women. On the street there is lots of rubbish although it is cleaned every day. On the streets there are dangers like cracked paving stones.
